name: Jinsei Game: Happy Family
overview: Jinsei Game: Happy Family (人生ゲーム ハッピーファミリー) is different from the Game of Life this time! When you get married and have children, your children can get a job! If you get married and have children, you will also be a worker! Life is different for each person ... Priceless! There must be priceless happiness in life that is hard to change! The happiness also has a big influence on the game! Repeated play is fun! You can take over the play by your grandchildren / descendants! The more you play, the more exciting the game!
